title: Tau-5 "Samsara"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may select a player, granting them overprotective defense with your dead god's flesh.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When all other Task Force members die, you flee the town, dying as well.

desc:
Post 4486
*" All remaining survivors are advised to remain in the evacuation shelter or any other safe area until the unit has secured the facility. "*
